main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Nouasseur AFB in French Morocco, where a white object was observed following a lead aircraft before suddenly disappearing.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a width greater than its height, resembling a shooting star in shape., It exhibited a very bright glow as if it was in clear daylight., No discernible fins were seen on the object., The object was observed moving smoothly and steadily without any maneuvers., The sighting lasted approximately 20-30 seconds.
sighted object: a white object resembling a shooting star
witness description: Lt Robert P Johnson and 2nd Lt Robert G Jemison
